name: Arcana (itch) (mehlody, poochii)
description:
Welcome to the mystical Arcana Carnival, where the Arcana that once inhabited your tarot deck have set up shop! 

. . .

Arcana is a 2D card-based action RPG following the journey of a faithless fortune teller.

Explore the carnival and meet the rogue Arcana who are your only ticket back home.

Employ the unique abilities of the fortune teller’s tarot deck, then summon the Arcana to fight and prove your worth in battle. 

Your fate is bound by your cards, but beware the hand that is dealt: the cards are not always on your side. 

Can you regain your faith and the Arcana's trust?
